body_content.explanation: a square, sweet bread containing currants (= small, dried black grapes), lemon peel, and sweet spices, with a sugar and water glaze (= a sticky, shiny mixture) on top:
examples: Patrons at the café will be served such traditional delights as scones, finger sandwiches, and Chelsea buns.
The dough we used for the chelsea buns consisted of yeast, bread flour, sugar, salt, milk powder, and butter.
